message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be incredibly valuable to your business. While I can't disclose the specifics just yet, I can assure you it's worth at least $1,500,000 to you. I'm willing to part with it for a price of $1,400,000.  This is a significant opportunity to acquire a product that will give you a competitive edge.  Let me know your thoughts.
